ability.name: All Signs Point to Yes
ability.description: * Place the High Priestess on All Signs Point to Yes * While the High Priestess is on All Signs Point to Yes, Threes, Fours and Fives can be used on Concentrate. * Discard the High Priestess from All Signs Point to Yes whenever you like. * When the High Priestess is discarded from All Signs Point to Yes, deal 1 Magic Ranged Damage to every Adversary.
ability.flavor: It almost seems like they're in a trance.
